name: FPG (First Person Greeter)
description:
It's nice to be greeting everyone. Now is your turn! Remember the greeting and WIN.

FPS is a single player game ...the objective is simple... keep the correct order of the greeting and WIN

How to play:

  • Use the Cursor keys and follow the sequence

Credits:

A game made for Global Game Jam 2016 in Game Jam Barcelona 2016 (link)

Appsnormals Team:

Dani Moya @dmoyateruel

Attention: Chrome browser recommended
